casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Donna Helms LEDBETTER 402PA15-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Meghan Adelle Jones, Attorney at Law, for Ledbetter, Donna Helms. Christopher W. Brooks, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Brandy Cook, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of October 2018 by State of NC to Dismiss Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
